page.title: 17CLUBS
page.content: Clubs are few in this area as the villages are so small. All the children have to travel to Wellington to participate in club activities. These clubs consist of a boys club, a Youth club, a Gymnastics club, Brownies, Cubs, Guides and Scouts clubs. The first two are mainly clubs where children enjoy games and recreational activties. Whereas the other clubs provide opportunities for learning different skills, going away to camp and enjoying canoeing, rock climbing, and following different nature trails. The adults have only one club in the area which is called the Langford Ladies. The ladies meet at Langford School once a month. Guests are invited to give demonstrations of flower arranging and cooking as well as talks on local history and many other subjets.
